    Package Description
    sc.fiji.snt.viewer
    Visualization of reconstructions

    • Uses of Annotation3D in sc.fiji.snt.viewer

      Methods in sc.fiji.snt.viewer that return Annotation3D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Annotation3D Viewer3D.annotateLine(java.util.Collection<? extends SNTPoint> points, java.lang.String label)
      Adds a line annotation to this viewer.
      Annotation3D Viewer3D.annotatePoint(SNTPoint point, java.lang.String label)
      Adds an highlighting point annotation to this viewer.
      Annotation3D Viewer3D.annotatePoints(java.util.Collection<? extends SNTPoint> points, java.lang.String label)
      Adds a scatter (point cloud) annotation to this viewer.
      Annotation3D Viewer3D.annotateSurface(java.util.Collection<? extends SNTPoint> points, java.lang.String label)
      Computes a Delaunay surface from a collection of points and adds it to the scene as an annotation.
      Annotation3D Viewer3D.getAnnotation(java.lang.String label)
      Gets the annotation associated with the specified label.
      Annotation3D Viewer3D.mergeAnnotations(java.util.Collection<Annotation3D> annotations, java.lang.String label)
      Merges a collection of annotations into a single object.
